b:class.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and (data:widgets none w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "indexSide"])
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "postSide"]
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isPage and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId == "allSide"
b:class.name: noSide

b:class.cond: data:view.isError and data:widgets none w => w.sectionId == "allSide"
b:class.name: noSide

b:if.cond: data:title not contains "[Ads]" and data:widget.sectionId not in ["mainSett","topAd-index","topAd-post","topList","mainAd-index","mainAd-post","mainMenu","layout-1","blockAd-index","blockAd-post","afterAd","beforeAd","footerDetails"]
data:widget.type in ["Label","LinkList"] and (data:title contains "isQuotes" or data:title contains "isIcons" or data:title contains "isFeatured")
data:widget.sectionId == "layout-1" and (data:content contains "slider-1" or data:content contains "grid-1")

b:elseif.cond: data:widget.sectionId in ["layout-2","layout-3"] and (data:content contains "slider-2" or data:content contains "grid-2" or data:content contains "tabs-1")

data:widget.sectionId in ["indexSide","allSide","postSide","panelContent","footerCols"] and (data:content contains "sided-1" or data:content contains "sided-2" or data:content contains "sided-3" or data:content contains "sided-4" or data:content contains "comments")

b:eval.expr: ".singlePost .postHeader.hasImage .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.grid-1 .item-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.tabs-1 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.sided-2 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.sided-4 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.FeaturedPost .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.slider-1 .slide-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "],.slider-2 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "]{background-color:" + data:link.target + "}"

".singlePost .postHeader.hasImage .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.grid-1 .item-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.tabs-1 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.sided-2 .item-0 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.sided-4 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.FeaturedPost .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.slider-1 .slide-1 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a,.slider-2 .postCat[data-cat=" + data:link.name + "] a{color:#fff}"

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["topList","topTicker"])

b:tag.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["layout-1","blockAd-index"]) or data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "blockAd-post")
b:tag.name: div

b:if.cond: data:allBylineItems.author or data:allBylineItems.timestamp or data:allBylineItems.comments or data:post.labels

b:tag.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "beforeAd"
b:tag.name: div

b:tag.cond: data:view.isPost and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "afterAd"
b:tag.name: div

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Facebook

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Twitter

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Linkedin

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Pinterest

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Telegram

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to Reddit

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=600, height=400, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
a.title: Share to WhatsApp

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["indexSide","allSide","postSide"])

data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isMultipleItems and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "indexSide"])) or (data:view.isPost and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["allSide", "postSide"]) or (data:view.isPage and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "allSide")
data:view.isLayoutMode or data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "footerCol"
